Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律か……
Entry.EnglishText: Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか……戒律のせいで しゃべれないんだったネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh right... Can't speak because of the commandments.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、男とは 話せないようだな……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems that you can't talk to men because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律……ですね。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, the Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか、戒律が あったんだったな……
Entry.EnglishText: Man... So we really can't talk because of the Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、女と 話せないんだったわね……
Entry.EnglishText: Because of the commandments, you aren't allowed to talk to women....

Entry.JapaneseText: 売りたそうにしているが、 戒律のせいで、異性とは 話ができないようだ。
Entry.EnglishText: He looks like he wants to sell, but because of the commandments, he can't seem to talk to the opposite sex.

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード・民家
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd - Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>『ダナのたんす』 詰め込みすぎ。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00>- Dana's Dresser - It's crammed full of things.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>『ダナのせんたくカゴ』 たんすに入りきらない服が 限界まで詰め込まれている。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00>- Dana's Laundry Basket - It's crammed with clothes that wouldn't fit in the dresser.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>『蒼獣様の教え（壁の張り紙）』 一．男女が外で言葉を交わすべからず。 二．女は家族以外に素顔を見せるべからず。 三．青く澄んだ水は聖なるものとすべし。 四．毎日必ず風呂に入り体を清めるべし。 五．早寝早起き七転び八起きすべし。 ……など、あれこれ書かれている。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00>- The Azure Beast's Teachings (Poster) - 1) Man and woman must not converse in public. 2) A woman should only show her face before her family. 3) Clear blue waters should be sacred. 4) One must purify thy own body on the daily. 5) One must rise and rest early everyday. And the like are written on it...

Entry.JapaneseText: ダナ
Entry.EnglishText: Dana

Entry.JapaneseText: ただでさえ肩身が狭いのに 種族が対立し始めて…… 私はどうしたら……
Entry.EnglishText: We were already ashamed as is, and then the racial conflicts began... What do I do...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>さん、私…… 私たち……間違ってませんよね？
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>... We... We're not wrong, are we?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……もう少し、考えてみます。 私たちが、本当にここで 生きていけるのかどうか……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been thinking about it a bit more. About whether we should continue living here or not...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……もう少し、考えてみます。 私たちが、本当にここで 生きていけるのかどうか……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been thinking about it a bit more. About whether we should continue living here or not...

Entry.JapaneseText: 東大陸のほうから、イヤな風が 吹いてるような気がします…… とても悪い感じです……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been feeling this unpleasant wind coming from Eastalia... It truly feels wrong...

Entry.JapaneseText: やっと決心がつきました。 オックスと二人、この街で がんばってみようと思います。
Entry.EnglishText: We've finally decided. We're going to keep living here in this town.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私たちが愛し合ってる事が 間違いじゃないって伝えるためにも、 逃げちゃいけないって……
Entry.EnglishText: We can't run away. We have to convey that we both love each other and prove that we're right!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマとヒューマが 愛し合うなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: A Gajuma and Huma together...

Entry.JapaneseText: 皆さん、おかしな事だと お考えでしょうね。
Entry.EnglishText: People must think that we're crazy!

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、誰かを好きになるって 理屈じゃないんです……
Entry.EnglishText: However, that's not a valid excuse if you want to love someone!

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><font:80000002><Unk19:3404>が仲間になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><Unk19:3404> joined the party.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><font:80000002><Unk19:3410>が同行します。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><Unk19:3410> is now travelling with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice
